channel.title: Redesign on DavidCraddock.net
channel.description: Recent content in Redesign on DavidCraddock.net

item.title: Site Redesign
item.description: I’ve just updated the design of this blog, re-enabled comments and added a contact tab. I’ve installed a strong anti-spam comment filter, but you should now be able to comment on entries. I’ve also changed the layout of things slightly, and made it easier to read.
